xvtc_selftest.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the self test function for the VTC core. The self test function reads the Version register.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who    Date     Changes
 ----- ------ -------- --------------------------------------------------
 6.1   adk    08/23/14 First Release.
                       Implemented following function:
                       XVtc_SelfTest.

#include "xvtc.h"

Functions

int XVtc_SelfTest (XVtc *InstancePtr)

Function Documentation

int XVtc_SelfTest ( XVtc *  InstancePtr  ) 

This function reads version register of the VTC core and compares with zero as part of self test.

Parameters:
InstancePtr is a pointer to the XVtc instance.
Returns:
  • XST_SUCCESS if the Version register read test was successful.
  • XST_FAILURE if the Version register read test failed.
Note:
None.
